More examplesFewer examplesAn expert cardiological evaluation should always be done before the procedure is carried out.A cardiological examination was performed every 12 months.Cardiological practice has changed over the past 20 years.Some activities are risky because of underlying cardiological problems.The pilots are required to have eye tests and cardiological assessments.
